```{r}
# Comment inside box
x <- rnorm(100, 0, 1)
y <- rnorm(100,2,3)

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

MyData <- data.frame(x, y)
glimpse(MyData)

ggplot(MyData, aes(x = x, y = y)) + 
  geom_point(colour = "blue") + 
  theme_bw() 

```
